data.title: Jade Thirlwall drops lyric video for her debut solo track 'Angel Of My Dreams'
data.meta_description: Jade Thirlwall has released her debut solo single 'Angel Of My Dreams' with the offficial music video dropping at 10am on Friday 19th July.
data.text:
WE LOVE IT!

After much speculation, Jade Thirlwall announced the name and release date of her debut solo single in July, and now it's finally landed, along with several videos! The singer, who is the last of the Little Mix girls to release solo music, had been teasing her music for some time, and 'Angel Of My Dreams' is now officially out.

Taking to Instagram on Friday 19th July, Jade wrote: 'Angel Of My Dreams is officially out in the world and I don‚Äôt know whether to cry or laugh or s--t myself üòÇ This song means everything to me - my love/hate letter to the music industry, telling my story from the beginning of my journey to now. It‚Äôs the perfect introduction and launch into my world as a solo artist so buckle the f--- up lolllll

'@mikesabath @r.i.pablo @iamstephjones I can‚Äôt explain how grateful I am to have been able to create this magic with you ü•π‚ô•Ô∏è What a dream team ‚òÅÔ∏è thank you for allowing our creative brains to merge and go wild. I‚Äôm proud of us for throwing the pop rule book out the window ü™üüí•

'Thank you to my whole team, from the start of my solo project to now - your unwavering belief in this and willingness to support me doing whatever I wanted gave me the creative freedom I needed to become JADE ‚ÄºÔ∏èüíÖüèΩ‚ú®'. (sic)

Fans were quick to express their love for the track, with one person congratulating Jade for 'saving pop'.

Another wrote: 'A POP LEGEND IS BORN üò≠‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•', with a third writing: 'It‚Äôs your time! üí´'.

Another excited fan commented: 'AHHHH ITS INCREDIBLE!!!! You really came through the way we knew you would!!!'. (sic)

The singer then took to Instagram to share a clip of the club remix of her debut song, telling her fans: 'Just when you thought it couldn't get any more chaotic ‚ú®‚ú® Angel Of My Dreams Club Remix is OUT NOW ‚ÄºÔ∏è You know what to do ü§ç'.

Is there a music video?

The official music video for 'Angel Of My Dreams' was released at 10am on Friday 19th July.

Watch the video below:

Hobbycraft Wimbledon also did an alternative music video of Jade's new song, and Jade loved it! She told the shop on TikTok: 'I‚ÄôVE MADE IT!!!! üò≠üòç incredible üî•üî•üî•üî•'.

Is there a lyric video?

Two weeks after releasing her song, with the music video, Jade also released her lyric video. You can watch it below...

Is there a slow version?

On Friday 9th August, Jade dropped another version of her debut single 'Angel Of My Dreams', showing off her incredible live vocals.

Dubbed the 'S.A.D. - Slow. Angelic. Dramatic.' version, Jade performs the track live, leaving fans in love.

In July, ahead of the release of her single, the singer took to social media to share a video featuring her name written in silver, on a black background. As a clip of her new song played, the video transitioned to Jade with angel wings, sitting on the floor of a bare room, which has an open doorway, where clouds can be seen blowing past.

Jade captioned her post: 'Angel Of My Dreams. 19 July. Pre-save now. ü™Ω'.

In the days that followed, Jade released further teases of the song, including a video of herself doing choreography to her new track, telling fans she's 'still got it huns'. (sic)

What is Jade Thirlwall's debut solo song called?

Jade's song is called 'Angel Of My Dreams'.

When will 'Angel Of My Dreams' be released?

The song was released on 19th July.

Take a look through Jade Thirlwall's career through the years:

This news comes just days after Jade's Little Mix bandmate Perrie, released her stunning music video for her second solo song 'Tears'. Meanwhile, Leigh-Anne Pinnock was the first of the current Little Mix girls to release solo music, bringing out 'Don't Say Love' last summer, along with several other songs, and an EP 'No Hard Feelings' earlier this year.
